snippet.title: Ayasa: Shadows of Silence - Official Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam Wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3146120/Ayasa_Shadows_of_Silence

Ayasa: Shadow of Silence teaser trailer for a look at the dark and mysterious upcoming platformer game where light and shadow hold the key to survival. 

Developed by Aya Games, Ayasa: Shadow of Silence challenges you to restore balance to a world on the brink of collapse by solving puzzles as you venture through six haunting lands.

Play as Ayasa, a young inhabitant of the land of Hope, who miraculously escapes the destruction of her world. Use Ayasa's abilities, such as rewinding time and becoming invisible, to pass through objects and sneak past enemies. 

Discord Permanent Link: https://discord.gg/YKgh5shCYJ
Press Kit: https://impress.games/press-kit/aya-games/ayasa-shadows-of-silence
X: https://x.com/_ayagames_
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ayasagame
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/ayagames
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/_ayagames_
GameJolt: https://gamejolt.com/@_ayagames_
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@_ayagames_

#Ayasa #Trailer #Gaming
